description: This source file defines repository classes for managing work orders and work order operations in a manufacturing API, utilizing SQLAlchemy for database interactions.

classes.name: WorkOrderRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling CRUD operations related to work orders.

classes.name: WorkOrderOperationRepository
classes.description: Repository class for handling CRUD operations related to work order operations.

methods.name: List[WorkOrder] list_work_orders( self, *, status: Optional[str], order_no: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of work orders filtered by optional status and order number, with pagination support.

methods.name: Optional[WorkOrder] get_work_order(self, wo_id: UUID)
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a specific work order by its UUID.

methods.name: WorkOrder create_work_order(self, payload: WorkOrderCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new work order entry in the database based on the provided schema object.

methods.name: List[WorkOrderOperation] list_operations( self, *, work_order_id: Optional[UUID], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of work order operations filtered by work order ID and status, with pagination.

ctags.name: create_work_order
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create_work_order(self, payload: WorkOrderCreate) -> WorkOrder:$/

ctags.name: get_work_order
ctags.pattern: /^    async def get_work_order(self, wo_id: UUID) -> Optional[WorkOrder]:$/

ctags.name: list_operations
ctags.signature: ( self, *, work_order_id: Optional[UUID], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )

ctags.name: list_work_orders
ctags.signature: ( self, *, status: Optional[str], order_no: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
